mapper.select:
select ri.seq_id , err_text , date_format(ri.register_date, '%Y/%m/%d') register_date , date_format(ri.update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date , order_no , order_status , sub_status_id , sub_status , order_datetime , order_date , order_time , cancel_due_date , order_check_datetime , order_confirm_datetime , delivery_eta_datetime , delivery_ata_datetime , pay_method_name , creadit_pay_method , credit_pay_times , delivery_method , delivery_type , order_type , multi_destination_flag , destination_match_flag , island_flag , rverify_flag , warning_type , rmember_flag , purchase_hist_mod_flag , total_goods_amt , total_consume_tax , total_shipping , gross_deduction , invoice_amt , total_amt , point_usage , total_coupon_usage , store_coupon_usage , rakuten_coupon_usage , order_post_no1 , order_post_no2 , order_add1 , order_add2 , order_add3 , order_surname , order_name , order_surname_kana , order_name_kana , order_tel1 , order_tel2 , order_tel3 , order_email , order_sex , request_no , request_received_no , ship_id , ship_charge , ship_substitute_fee , ship_total_consume_tax , ship_total_goods_amt , ship_total_amt , indicates , delivery_post_no1 , delivery_post_no2 , delivery_add1 , delivery_add2 , delivery_add3 , delivery_surname , delivery_name , delivery_surname_kana , delivery_name_kana , delivery_tel1 , delivery_tel2 , delivery_tel3 , product_detail_id , product_id , product_name , product_no , product_manage_no , unit_price , unit_no , delivery_cost_include , tax_exclude , substitute_fee_include , product_option , point_multiple , delivery_info , inventory_type , wrap_title1 , wrap_name1 , wrap_amt1 , wrap_tax_include1 , wrap_type1 , wrap_title2 , wrap_name2 , wrap_amt2 , wrap_tax_include2 , wrap_type2 , delivery_time , delivery_date_sel , manager , quick_note , msg_to_customer , gift_request , comment , util_terminal , mail_carrier_code , tomorrow_hope , drug_order_flag , rakuten_super_deal , membership_program , baggage_claim_no , delivery_company from rakuten_info ri left outer join translation_err terr on terr.trans_target_id = ri.seq_id and terr.trans_target_type = 'R'
ri.seq_id = #{seq_id}
ri.register_date between str_to_date(concat(#{register_date},' ','00:00:00'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') and str_to_date(concat(#{register_date},' ','23:59:59'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S')
and (delivery_surname like '%${delivery_surname}%' or delivery_surname_kana like '%${delivery_surname}%')
and (delivery_name like '%${delivery_name}%' or delivery_name_kana like '%${delivery_name}%')
and delivery_tel1 like '%${delivery_tel1}%'
and delivery_tel2 like '%${delivery_tel2}%'
and delivery_tel3 like '%${delivery_tel3}%'
and order_no like '%${order_no}%'
and product_name like '%${product_name}%'
and baggage_claim_no like '%${baggage_claim_no}%'
(delivery_surname like '%${delivery_name}%' or delivery_surname_kana like '%${delivery_name}%' or delivery_name like '%${delivery_name}%' or delivery_name_kana like '%${delivery_name}%')
and delivery_tel1 = #{delivery_tel1}
and delivery_tel2 = #{delivery_tel2}
and delivery_tel3 = #{delivery_tel3}
ri.register_date < date_add(now(), interval -7 day)
ri.register_date between str_to_date(#{start_date}, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and now()
order by order_datetime desc
mapper.update: update rakuten_frozen_info set update_date = now() , delivery_company = #{delivery_company} where order_no = #{order_no}
update rakuten_info set register_date = now() where seq_id = #{seq_id}
mapper.select:
select seq_id , date_format(register_date, '%Y/%m/%d') register_date , date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date , order_no , order_status , sub_status_id , sub_status , order_datetime , order_date , order_time , cancel_due_date , order_check_datetime , order_confirm_datetime , delivery_eta_datetime , delivery_ata_datetime , pay_method_name , creadit_pay_method , credit_pay_times , delivery_method , delivery_type , order_type , multi_destination_flag , destination_match_flag , island_flag , rverify_flag , warning_type , rmember_flag , purchase_hist_mod_flag , total_goods_amt , total_consume_tax , total_shipping , gross_deduction , invoice_amt , total_amt , point_usage , total_coupon_usage , store_coupon_usage , rakuten_coupon_usage , order_post_no1 , order_post_no2 , order_add1 , order_add2 , order_add3 , order_surname , order_name , order_surname_kana , order_name_kana , order_tel1 , order_tel2 , order_tel3 , order_email , order_sex , request_no , request_received_no , ship_id , ship_charge , ship_substitute_fee , ship_total_consume_tax , ship_total_goods_amt , ship_total_amt , indicates , delivery_post_no1 , delivery_post_no2 , delivery_add1 , delivery_add2 , delivery_add3 , delivery_surname , delivery_name , delivery_surname_kana , delivery_name_kana , delivery_tel1 , delivery_tel2 , delivery_tel3 , product_detail_id , product_id , product_name , product_no , product_manage_no , unit_price , unit_no , delivery_cost_include , tax_exclude , substitute_fee_include , product_option , point_multiple , delivery_info , inventory_type , wrap_title1 , wrap_name1 , wrap_amt1 , wrap_tax_include1 , wrap_type1 , wrap_title2 , wrap_name2 , wrap_amt2 , wrap_tax_include2 , wrap_type2 , delivery_time , delivery_date_sel , manager , quick_note , msg_to_customer , gift_request , comment , util_terminal , mail_carrier_code , tomorrow_hope , drug_order_flag , rakuten_super_deal , membership_program , baggage_claim_no , delivery_company from rakuten_frozen_info
seq_id = #{seq_id}
and order_no like '%${order_no}%'
and product_name like '%${product_name}%'
and baggage_claim_no like '%${baggage_claim_no}%'
